John's new song a good night it's all
about finding your soulmate the conceit

of going to the club and meeting your
future wife but you happen to find
somebody that you really hit it off with
and then the video goes from the club to
oh I think I found my wife and here's a

so we just thought about really trying

into actual production and actual

it's exciting to use Google pixel
because one the quality is amazing and I
think it kind of fits with the theme of
what the the video is all about which is
kind of embracing our new future we
really wanted to push the phone to its

push the image we want to see if we
could shoot bare bones just a cell phone
the kind of a crazy ambitious goal
phones provide a lot of really unique

expensive large bulky camera we can't
really take 12 of them and then put them

at a time you know unless you have an

only cost maybe a few hundred dollars
it's an incredible tool for young

that you can have that in your pocket
I love seeing all these young filmmakers

can
and be a part of it so I think it's a
